module.name: content
module.title: At vero eos et accusamus
module.html:
Our attorneys are well-qualified to handle a broad range of cases dealing with Labor and Employment disputes, such as:

  • employment agreements
  • equity compensation agreements
  • non-competition agreements
  • confidentiality agreements
  • wage and hour regualtion
  • workplace investigation
  • termination & layoffs

Call us at (212) 920-4503 to schedule a consultation so we can begin assisting you with your Labor & Employment legal problems.
